forecast.name: New Year's Day
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible
forecast.shortForecast: Partly Sunny then Chance Snow Showers
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of snow showers and a slight chance of snow after 4pm. Partly sunny, with a high near 21. West wind around 10 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of snow showers and a slight chance of snow. Mostly cloudy. Low around 16, with temperatures rising to around 18 overnight. West southwest wind around 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Bucks Run will be open for skiing tomorrow but will not be groomed. The building will be open for its usual hours. The park says that the next possible groom date is January 2nd. At 3:30 today it's snowing really hard and the trail is filling in nicely. Might be a good classic day as the track is rock solid and once it's skied in a little bit it should be good. Not so sure about skating for tomorrow.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Lots of lake effect snow !  Firm groom this AM was covered this afternoon with 2 to 3 inches of fairly light snow resulting in a pleasant skiable skate deck . The  classic tracks look great and those skiers were moving fast . The best access is through Valley road dead end as the Lodge side is very busy with the downhill crowd .

nubsNob.liftsOpen: All 8 chairlifts, Rope Tow and Conveyor.
nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails will be power tilled and tracked this morning. Conditions are excellent
nubsNob.comments:
Happy New Year!
The first day of 2026 offers skiers mid-winter conditions on all slopes, parks, and trails. The lifts will spin from 9:00 a.m. to 9:00 p.m. with an hour break at 4:30 p.m. to groom for night skiing. Pintail Peak lodge is open with food service and an espresso bar. The soup of the day is beef barley. Make it a great New Year's Day at Nub's Nob.
